task_definition_name: Mifos Mobile: App crashes if home button pressed when applying for loan
description:
# Description:

If home button pressed when applying for loan the app crashes.

# Steps to reproduce:

1. Click on Apply for Loan
2. Press home button and try to reopen app

# Expected behaviour:

App should resume activity when opened again

# Observed behaviour:

App crashes when opened again

# Submission

Submit a PR [here](https://github.com/openMF/mifos-mobile/)
